trans-unit.source: Generates a web request to use to acquire, renew, change, release or break the lease for the blob.
trans-unit.target: Generates a web request to use to acquire, renew, change, release or break the lease for the blob.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Uri</codeEntityReference> specifying the absolute URI to the blob.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Uri</codeEntityReference> specifying the absolute URI to the blob.

trans-unit.source: The server timeout interval, in seconds.
trans-unit.target: The server timeout interval, in seconds.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.LeaseAction</codeEntityReference> enumeration value indicating the lease action to perform.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.LeaseAction</codeEntityReference> enumeration value indicating the lease action to perform.

trans-unit.source: A string specifying the lease ID to propose for the result of an acquire or change operation, or <codeInline>null</codeInline> if no ID is proposed for an acquire operation.
trans-unit.target: A string specifying the lease ID to propose for the result of an acquire or change operation, or <codeInline>null</codeInline> if no ID is proposed for an acquire operation.

trans-unit.source: This parameter should be <codeInline>null</codeInline> for renew, release, and break operations.
trans-unit.target: This parameter should be <codeInline>null</codeInline> for renew, release, and break operations.

trans-unit.source: The lease duration, in seconds, for acquire operations.
trans-unit.target: The lease duration, in seconds, for acquire operations.

trans-unit.source: If this is -1 then an infinite duration is specified.
trans-unit.target: If this is -1 then an infinite duration is specified.

trans-unit.source: This should be <codeInline>null</codeInline> for renew, change, release, and break operations.
trans-unit.target: This should be <codeInline>null</codeInline> for renew, change, release, and break operations.

trans-unit.source: The amount of time to wait, in seconds, after a break operation before the lease is broken.
trans-unit.target: The amount of time to wait, in seconds, after a break operation before the lease is broken.

trans-unit.source: If this is <codeInline>null</codeInline> then the default time is used.
trans-unit.target: If this is <codeInline>null</codeInline> then the default time is used.

trans-unit.source: This should be <codeInline>null</codeInline> for acquire, renew, change, and release operations.
trans-unit.target: This should be <codeInline>null</codeInline> for acquire, renew, change, and release operations.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> object that represents the condition that must be met in order for the request to proceed.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> object that represents the condition that must be met in order for the request to proceed.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest</codeEntityReference> object.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest</codeEntityReference> object.
